channel.title: Login help .grr
channel.description:
When i log into my server it turn's into a black screen and after 10 seconds it logs me out.
in run.bat it shows this
Exception in thread "Thread-9" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : "%1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at client.orbs(client.java:12360) at client.method62(client.java:3469) at client.method7(client.java:2582) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120) at client.run(client.java:5383) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
plz help

item.title: Login help .grr
item.dc:creator: @Dark_PK_scape Dark_PK_scape
item.description:
@Dark_PK_scape wrote:

When i log into my server it turn’s into a black screen and after 10 seconds it logs me out.

in run.bat it shows this

Exception in thread “Thread-9” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string
: “%1”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
at client.orbs(client.java:12360)
at client.method62(client.java:3469)
at client.method7(client.java:2582)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120)
at client.run(client.java:5383)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

plz help
